name: Dino Stack
description:
Meet this attractive blocks building game without complex operation now!

Try to build the blocks as high as possible with touching the moving blocks at the right time.

Meet the dinosaur with the longest neck in the world and give them the new world by creating the higher vision.

▣ You can check the latest news for 'Dino Stack' on Facebook.
https://www.facebook.com/DreamplayIndieZone/
